title: Blackheart Bike Co. joins the equity crowdfunding party, teases new gravel e-bike
content:
Blackheart Bike Co. has been making their titanium road-slash-gravel bike since launching in early 2020, and recently released a more affordable aluminum version, too. The bikeâ€™s standout feature is its versatility, letting you simply swap between road and gravel wheels and tires to essentially have two bikes in one. Now, you can own more than
